author: Manuel Luz
comment: Contact names won't show but a great keyboard when you get used to it.

reply.author: ETAOI Systems
reply.content: Thank you for your review, we are looking into this issue!

title: Contact name

author: Philip Grebowiec
comment: Looks and works great, but it doesn't properly show contact names at times

reply.author: ETAOI Systems
reply.content: Thank you for the review, we are working to fix it in the next release!

author: Ismail Tofey
comment: Bought the app, opened it but just see a blank screen. Refund please

reply.author: ETAOI Systems
reply.content: Hi Ismail, Which Android Wear smartwatch are you using? Have you tried to re-install the app? We are looking into the issue and we will get back to you shortly. Would you mind to drop us an email at support@etaoisystems.com so we can give you a better support? Thanks.

title: Does not work

author: David Louie
comment: great app, i would just like it to sync contact names instead of just phone numbers to display on each conversation thread.

reply.author: ETAOI Systems
reply.content: Hi David! Thanks for your review. We will look into this as it should syncronize all the names from your contact list. Please check on your phone if you have saved those numbers in your contact list. If you need any more help please give us a shout in our Google+ Community.

author: David Sanchez
comment: Pretty difficult to master. I couldn't get it into learning mode.
title: I have a moto 360 2nd gen
